repairedDockerfile:
# specify the node base image with your desired version node:<version> 
FROM node:8.9.1 
WORKDIR /app 
COPY package.json /app 
RUN npm install && npm cache clean --force;
COPY . /app 
CMD node index.js 
# replace this with your application's default port 
EXPOSE 3003 
EXPOSE 42687
